Study: Thyagarajan et al. (2025) J. Hered. esaf072
Interpretation: This positive effect means that females carrying male-evolved haplotypes have lower fitness than females carrying control genomes.

Study: Thyagarajan et al. (2025) J. Hered. esaf072
Interpretation: This positive effect means that males carrying male-evolved haplotypes have higher fitness than males carrying control genomes.
